messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Debating
messages.msgSnippet: Well, dear, it would depend on what you charge   Some agents seem to make more money than their clients  Lynda ... From:  To:
messages.messageBody:
Well, dear, it would depend on what you charge <g> Some agents seem to make
more money than their clients <g>

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: <NumoAstro@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 04, 2001 6:11 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Debating


> In a message dated 9/4/01 12:59:00 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
> > But the people debating
> > obviously have something to iron out, I say leave them to it. When
they're
> > all done, they'll quit.
>
> I agree Brenda... I've been enjoying reading what many people have to say
> about the Gun issue. I'm particularly impressed with Lynda and Sandra's
> writing skills and quite envious they can write in such an eloquent
fashion
> for long periods of time. My only hope is they both write books or maybe
> even one together (LOL) on topics that are heated, from completely
different
> perspectives. I find it fascinating..... Now that I've come up with an
idea
> for a book for 2 people to write, maybe I ought to think about becomming
an
> agent (LOL)..
>
> Dawn
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^
> Dawn Falbe
> Personal Development Coach
> Relocational Astrologer
> (520) 579-2646
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
> The Path of Least Resistance is Inside of You

>

> are people who get up and look for the
> circumstances they want, and,
> if they can't find them, make them." - George Bernard Shaw
>
> "The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in
school."-George
> Bernard Shaw

messages.subject: Debating
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/4/01 12:59:00 AM US Mountain Standard Time, ... I agree Brenda... I ve been enjoying reading what many people have to say about the Gun
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/4/01 12:59:00 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> But the people debating
> obviously have something to iron out, I say leave them to it. When they're
> all done, they'll quit.

I agree Brenda... I've been enjoying reading what many people have to say
about the Gun issue. I'm particularly impressed with Lynda and Sandra's
writing skills and quite envious they can write in such an eloquent fashion
for long periods of time. My only hope is they both write books or maybe
even one together (LOL) on topics that are heated, from completely different
perspectives. I find it fascinating..... Now that I've come up with an idea
for a book for 2 people to write, maybe I ought to think about becomming an
agent (LOL)..

Dawn
^^^^^^^^^^^^
Dawn Falbe
Personal Development Coach
Relocational Astrologer
(520) 579-2646
^^^^^^^^^^^^^
The Path of Least Resistance is Inside of You
www.astrologerdawn.com
Enlightening women on how to live their Soul Purpose

"The people who get on in this world
are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and,
if they can't find them, make them." - George Bernard Shaw

"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school."-George
Bernard Shaw
